stories.original_headline: This AI spots dangerous blood cells doctors often miss
stories.original_summary: A generative AI system can now analyze blood cells with greater accuracy and confidence than human experts, detecting subtle signs of diseases like leukemia. It not only spots rare abnormalities but also recognizes its own uncertainty, making it a powerful support tool for clinicians.
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Mirror Reveals Hidden Blights in the Blood!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a wondrous divining mirror. This artifact can peer into a patient's vital humors with unmatched precision, spotting early signs of rare crimson sicknesses that often elude even the most seasoned healers. It even knows when it is uncertain, aiding potion-masters in their diagnoses.

stories.original_headline: Scientists discover how the uterus knows when to push during childbirth
stories.original_summary: Childbirth depends not just on hormones, but on the uterusâ€™s ability to sense physical force. Scientists found that pressure and stretch sensors in uterine muscles and surrounding nerves work together to trigger coordinated contractions. stories.fantasy_headline: Loremakers Uncover Secret of the Birthing Vessel's Will!
stories.fantasy_story: Healers have long sought to understand how the birthing vessel knows when to begin its sacred work. Now, loremakers have discovered that beyond arcane essences, tiny, sensitive threads within the vessel respond to touch and stretch. These inner runes work together to guide the joyous process of bringing forth new life.
